channel.title: Addiction
channel.description:
I'm addicted to Facebook and MITB, I browse the forums way too much, even when im with friends ill be on my iPhone checking this shit... need to get a hobby. Ideas?
I was thinking of just going to the gym.
p.s. you are all contributing to my addiction thx

item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:

ITT: A black guy pretending he is asian and Ollie being ironic by talking about his addiction ON his addiction.

item.title: Addiction
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

Archer:

I too am addicted to this site, I cannot be on the computer anymore without having a tab open on mopar and always checking it. I think this may be a reason I bombed junior year is because when I study all I am thinking about and reading is mopar for some reason. So I think im done, may do a gym too.

i check several forums frequently and dominated school so i doubt thats the cause

jk im just smart

Read full topic

item.title: Addiction
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:14, topic:344720”][quote author=Original Daniel link=topic=441091.msg3241146#msg3241146 date=1276939665]

You’ll pass hours in there without even realizing

If you spend hours at the gym you’re doing it wrong
[/quote]

Cardio you nub, or can you only run for 10 minutes before your fat ass gets tired?[/quote]

I was a heavy competitor in athletics from like 04 to 09, and I boxed for a while after that. In short: no I can run longer than 10 mins.

If your workout lasts hours, it’s probably not intense enough to do anything. Unless you’re really fit and can just run for hours straight. I trained with a pro decathlon competitor who knows more about fitness than all of us and our sessions were only an hour and a half.

Read full topic

item.title: Addiction
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:4, topic:344720”]The problem is I just sit at work browsing here too, there isn’t really much to do at work. I get given work and have to complete it when given, but if there is no work I literally have to sit and wait for work to be passed onto me.

I have started reading alot of wiki pages and I have started learning some PHP.[/quote]Yeah, when I’m bored I learn a new programming language too.

But as for real shit, I suggest you go to the gym. Once you get the hang of it, it’s fucking awesome. You’ll pass hours in there without even realizing, and the best thing is to go straight from the gym to the pool. It’s great. I haven’t been able to go to the gym for the past month because I just got a cast taken off and my wrist is still weak as fuck and under the risk of fracturing again and it’s driving me nuts.

Read full topic

item.title: Addiction
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

The problem is I just sit at work browsing here too, there isn’t really much to do at work. I get given work and have to complete it when given, but if there is no work I literally have to sit and wait for work to be passed onto me.

I have started reading alot of wiki pages and I have started learning some PHP.
